product_name: Hugger Mugger Eco Bamboo Yoga Towel
long_description: Fan of hot yoga? The Hugger Mugger Eco Bamboo yoga towel soaks up sweat and adds traction to your yoga mat. Bamboo blend is soft and absorbent; eco Polymer Environmental Resin (PER) backing grips floors and mats to help prevent the towel from bunching up. Spread the towel over your yoga mat to add traction; towel measures 72 x 26 in. The Hugger Mugger Eco Bamboo yoga towel is machine washable.
short_description: Fan of hot yoga? The Hugger Mugger Eco Bamboo yoga towel soaks up sweat and adds traction to your yoga mat.
